Price: $14.94 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:10:33 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Pattern
Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

item.title: Ontel Brella Shield Windshield Sun Shade by Arctic Air, Compact Design Pops Open Like an Umbrella and Fits Cars, Trucks & SUVs – One-Size (31×57) – As Seen on TV
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshieldFoldable Design For Easy Storage – ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)



Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshield
Foldable Design For Easy Storage – When done using, just click the locking latch and pop the sun blocker shut into its compact size to easily store it in the dashboard, door panel or even under the seat without taking up any extra space
Sunshade Umbrella For Most Vehicles – The retractable shade collapses to less than 1 square foot instantly, and its universal size works equally well with the windshields of trucks, cars or even SUVs
Protect Your Car’s Interior – This car window cover is designed to block intense heat and harmful UV rays from the sun to help keep the inside of your car cooler, while preventing the car seats, upholstery and dashboard from fading and cracking
Privacy & Safety – The sun blocking screen provides shade to your car, truck, SUV or RV whether you are driving to work or halting mid-way on the road. It keeps your vehicle at a safe temperature while also maintaining complete privacy

3.5
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)

item.title: HUK Men’s Icon X Hoodie | Fishing Shirt with +50 UPF Sun Protection
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Huk: Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish. Huk Icon X Hoodie: A Performance shirt that not only looks great but is comfortable and built with a durable poly-knit construction with mesh underarm and back SUN ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.60
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:38 UTC – Details)


Huk: Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish. Huk Icon X Hoodie: A Performance shirt that not only looks great but is comfortable and built with a durable poly-knit construction with mesh underarm and back SUN PROTECTION: This fishing shirt protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays – Huk added the most advanced sun-blocking +50 UPF materials to their apparel to block both UVA and UVB rays MOISTURE TRANSPORT: Keeping dry is critical to keeping warm on the cold water – Hydrophobic or “water-hating” quality within the fibers of this fishing shirt, transport sweat away from skin to the exterior of the shirt where it can evaporate efficiently I.C.E. Technology: I.C.E. (Internal Cooling Element) is a next to skin technology that creates a cooling effect. Fabrics feel cooler to the touch, work to wick perspiration away from you skin, and dry at a more rapid rate to help cool your body
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.65 x 9.96 x 1.02 inches; 14.39 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ H1200384

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $25.99 - $13.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

YOUR CHOICE OF SHADE… Semi-Transparent Sunshades

Semi-transparent sunshades are for areas in which Sun & UV protection are more important than visibility such as baby car seat sun protection for infants, small children, pets, adults with sensitive skin, pilots of aircraft and watercraft, providing the ultimate protection for the whole family.

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

Quality Matters! 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁y

Kinder Fluff sun shades are made of 120GSM (versus commonly used 80 GSM), combined with 15s tinted static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s).

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with higher quality connector clamps, preventing breakage/separation of the wires during folding.

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 (SPF 100)

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the max level of UPF in the category 50+

Trusted Brand

Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when choosing a high-quality sunshade.

-Because We Care-

(Flip to see more)

Feel The Difference…

This set contains 2 Transparent and 2 semi-transparent sunshades + a storage bag.

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, this certified and award-winning sunshade, blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

Overlap to cover larger windows.

(Flip to see more)

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the maximum level of UPF in the category (50+) and maximum protection of 100 SPF.

(Flip to see more)

Overlap to fit

Designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping. Perfect for car side windows, windshield, rear, back seat as a baby car seat sun protection, at home, in the office, on the boat, airplane, bus, train, farm… Kinder Fluff protects the whole family from sun exposure, including pets & plants.

Please Note: the shades are packed back to back to protect the film from damage & it may appear as 2 pieces rather than 4. Please pull them apart gently and you will have a complete set of 4.

(Flip to see more)

𝗜𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗿, 𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗲, 𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽, 𝗯𝘂𝘀, 𝘃𝗮𝗻 𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻..

Protect yourself and your loved ones from the heat, glare and the damaging sun throughout the day.

According to EPA, most of an average person’s UV exposure from the sun occurs before the age of 18. Too much UV exposure or frequent sunburns, particularly during childhood, can cause severe or serious damage to the skin.

For peace of mind, go with certified sunshades, choose Kinder Fluff.

(Flip to see more)

𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝘂𝘀𝗲

Do you have that kitchen window that lets too much sun in, spoiling your cooking activity?

Or an office window that the sun glares to your face when you are trying to see your laptop screen?

Then this sunshade is for you. Perfect sized at 20”x12″, it sticks to any glass surface including the ones inside the house and fits most window size by simply overlapping each other.

(Flip to see more)

𝗔𝗻𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲, 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲…

Kinder Fluff sunshades are designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping them. Perfect for car windows, windshield, and back seat windows as a baby car sun shade and also any large windows, such as aircraft or watercraft, or the ones inside your house.

If it is good enough for a pilot in high altitude , it is definitely good enough to protect you on the ground.

The only Certified Sunshade & The Winner of Mom’s Choice Gold Award Install and remove in seconds

Due to the static effect created by the film, this sunshade will cling to any glass surface without any suction cup or adhesive. simply put the shade on the window and gently press to stabilize.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such a case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

𝐆𝐎𝐋𝐃 𝐀𝐖𝐀𝐑𝐃

The Gold Winner of Mom’s Choice Award.

The Mom’s Choice Awards (MCA) evaluates products and services created for children, families and educators. The program is globally recognized for establishing the benchmark of excellence in family-friendly media, products and services.

𝗚𝗢 𝗕𝗘𝗬𝗢𝗡𝗗 𝗔𝗪𝗔𝗥𝗗

Winner of the global acknowledgement of businesses who went above and beyond to make the world a better place!

KinderFluff is dedicated to offering premium quality products and affordable for consumers who seek baby products that are both comfortable and safe, after all, “Because We Care” is our motto.

This is how it works…

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with tightly woven fabric structured with fewer “holes or spaces” for the UVR not to sneak through to your skin. The UV absorption is enhanced using black dye. Then the UV absorbers and blockers are added during the manufacturing process which also increase the sun protection ability of the mesh, providing extra sun protection and UVR block for the whole family and your car’s interior.

No suction cups or adhesive and definitely no residue

Due to the Static Effect created by the thick film, these shades “cling” to the window without any suction cups or adhesive. easy on easy off for any glass surface

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁

Often you won’t get any information about the structure of car window shades in the market. No one will tell you what type of fabric they are made of or what kind of film they use. Simply because they are not top of the line! Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when looking for a high quality sun shade. We’re the only brand with certified shades proven to block over 99%UVR rays & MCA Gold winner. We have confidence in our quality.

Videos and How To Fold Instructions

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

𝗦𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘀𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝗬𝗘𝗦!

Watch the video for UV protection and then flip to watch the video for sun exposure.

-Because we care-

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

𝑾𝒂𝒕𝒄𝒉 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒗𝒊𝒅𝒆𝒐 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒔𝒆𝒆 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓𝒔𝒆𝒍𝒇!

.

.

Then flip to learn about the visibility.

(Flip to see more…)

Quality Matters

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, certified and award winner, it blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

(Flip to see more…)

Anywhere, Everywhere…

Where sun and UVR protection is needed!

In the car, on the bus, airplane, boat, home or office… it clings in any glass type, even the ones inside of your house or tinted ones.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻

Remove from the pack & separate the shades carefully attached to each other by the cling film side.

How to install: 1.Wipe the window with a damp cloth. 2.Place the Window Shade with the static side on the window. 3.Apply pressure throughout the sun shade until it is firmly pressed to the window.

Note: It’s normal to see wrinkles on the shades when you first receive them. This is the nature of the film & happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

Play & flip to see more

(Flip to see more…)

𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

When not in use Twist to Fold into a small circle and fit in the provided storage bag for easy storage inside any handbag, car organiser, sun visor strap or door pocket.

How to fold: 1. Put all the pieces that are to be folded together on top of each other. 2. Hold the shades on both sides. 3. Bring your hands towards each other with a twist. 4. The lightweight wire will fold itself into a small circle. 5. Store in the provided storage pouch.

Play the video for more.

What’s special about this sunshade?

It’s made of 120 GSM mesh (versus commonly used 80 GSM), paired with 15s static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s), offering superior quality & higher density, providing better sun/UV protection. It also comes in 2 transparency options.

How can I install and uninstall this?

Wipe the window clean, throw this bad boy over the glass and give it a gentle swipe. For folding, please see video for visual explanation.

Can I open the window with this sunshade on?

No. The shades attach to the glass so they need to be removed before operating the car window.

Mine arrived with some wrinkles. Is it normal?

Yes. This is due to the nature of the plastic film and happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

What is included in the package?

This set includes 2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent shades & a free storage pouch. Please keep in mind they are packed back to back to protect the film from damage during shipping & may appear as 2 pieces rather sets. Pull them apart gently.

The only car window shades CERTIFIED to block 99.79% of UVA & 99.95% of UVB. SPF100 & UPF 50+
This set contains 2 transparent & 2 semi-transparent car window covers to use according to your need
Made of 120 GSM,15S Film & a unique clamp, it’s the most durable automotive interior sun protection
These foldable baby car window shades are designed to fit any windows . Each car shade is 20″x12″
Best as baby shower gift, car accessories for men, women , babies & pet in car,truck,suv,van,bus.

    Kinder Fluff sunshades are designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping them. Perfect for car windows, windshield, and back seat windows as a baby car sun shade and also any large windows, such as aircraft or watercraft, or the ones inside your house.

    If it is good enough for a pilot in high altitude , it is definitely good enough to protect you on the ground.

The only Certified Sunshade & The Winner of Mom’s Choice Gold Award

  1. Install and remove in seconds

    Due to the static effect created by the film, this sunshade will cling to any glass surface without any suction cup or adhesive. simply put the shade on the window and gently press to stabilize.

    Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such a case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

  2. 𝐆𝐎𝐋𝐃 𝐀𝐖𝐀𝐑𝐃

    The Gold Winner of Mom’s Choice Award.

    The Mom’s Choice Awards (MCA) evaluates products and services created for children, families and educators. The program is globally recognized for establishing the benchmark of excellence in family-friendly media, products and services.

  3. 𝗚𝗢 𝗕𝗘𝗬𝗢𝗡𝗗 𝗔𝗪𝗔𝗥𝗗

    Winner of the global acknowledgement of businesses who went above and beyond to make the world a better place!

    KinderFluff is dedicated to offering premium quality products and affordable for consumers who seek baby products that are both comfortable and safe, after all, “Because We Care” is our motto.

  4. This is how it works…

    Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with tightly woven fabric structured with fewer “holes or spaces” for the UVR not to sneak through to your skin. The UV absorption is enhanced using black dye. Then the UV absorbers and blockers are added during the manufacturing process which also increase the sun protection ability of the mesh, providing extra sun protection and UVR block for the whole family and your car’s interior.

  5. No suction cups or adhesive and definitely no residue

    Due to the Static Effect created by the thick film, these shades “cling” to the window without any suction cups or adhesive. easy on easy off for any glass surface

  6. 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁

    Often you won’t get any information about the structure of car window shades in the market. No one will tell you what type of fabric they are made of or what kind of film they use. Simply because they are not top of the line! Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when looking for a high quality sun shade. We’re the only brand with certified shades proven to block over 99%UVR rays & MCA Gold winner. We have confidence in our quality.

Videos and How To Fold Instructions

  1. (Flip to see more…)

    𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

    𝗦𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘀𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝗬𝗘𝗦!

    Watch the video for UV protection and then flip to watch the video for sun exposure.

    -Because we care-


  2. (Flip to see more…)

    𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

    𝑾𝒂𝒕𝒄𝒉 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒗𝒊𝒅𝒆𝒐 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒔𝒆𝒆 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓𝒔𝒆𝒍𝒇!

    .

    .

    Then flip to learn about the visibility.


  3. (Flip to see more…)

    Quality Matters

    Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, certified and award winner, it blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

  4. (Flip to see more…)

    Anywhere, Everywhere…

    Where sun and UVR protection is needed!

    In the car, on the bus, airplane, boat, home or office… it clings in any glass type, even the ones inside of your house or tinted ones.

    Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

  5. (Flip to see more…)

    𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻

    Remove from the pack & separate the shades carefully attached to each other by the cling film side.

    How to install: 1.Wipe the window with a damp cloth. 2.Place the Window Shade with the static side on the window. 3.Apply pressure throughout the sun shade until it is firmly pressed to the window.

    Note: It’s normal to see wrinkles on the shades when you first receive them. This is the nature of the film & happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

    Play & flip to see more


  6. (Flip to see more…)

    𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

    When not in use Twist to Fold into a small circle and fit in the provided storage bag for easy storage inside any handbag, car organiser, sun visor strap or door pocket.

    How to fold: 1. Put all the pieces that are to be folded together on top of each other. 2. Hold the shades on both sides. 3. Bring your hands towards each other with a twist. 4. The lightweight wire will fold itself into a small circle. 5. Store in the provided storage pouch.

    Play the video for more.

What’s special about this sunshade?

It’s made of 120 GSM mesh (versus commonly used 80 GSM), paired with 15s static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s), offering superior quality & higher density, providing better sun/UV protection. It also comes in 2 transparency options.

How can I install and uninstall this?

Wipe the window clean, throw this bad boy over the glass and give it a gentle swipe. For folding, please see video for visual explanation.

Can I open the window with this sunshade on?

No. The shades attach to the glass so they need to be removed before operating the car window.

Mine arrived with some wrinkles. Is it normal?

Yes. This is due to the nature of the plastic film and happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

What is included in the package?

This set includes 2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent shades & a free storage pouch. Please keep in mind they are packed back to back to protect the film from damage during shipping & may appear as 2 pieces rather sets. Pull them apart gently.

4.5
Price: $25.99 - $13.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:32 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:37 UTC – Details)

From the brand

EcoNour Side Window Sunshades!

EcoNour Car Window Shades are designed to offer superior sun protection with no compromise to the drivers as well as the passengers!

About Us!

EcoNour is mainly focused on providing premium quality products that last longer to keep your kids safe from hot sun rays.From Sunshades to other car accessories, our products enhance the way you live your life.Our products are designed in New Jersey, USA!

Complete Car Care Solution

How did we get our start?

Started back in 2015 as a small, family-owned business from New Jersey, we strive to provide you the best and only the best!

What makes our products unique?

Our premium materials and long-lasting endurance are what make us stand out from the competition!

Why do we love what we do?

EcoNour will always stay within its core values of selling quality products to help people’s lives transform a bit better!

Absolute Sun Protection: EcoNour Car Window Sunshades protect your infants and pets from harmful UV rays and act as a sun blocker that provides great SPF protection. Featuring a size of 20 x 12 inches, it offers excellent sun protection.
Unique Dual Layer Design: EcoNour’s Window Shades are constructed with a dual-layer, 120 GSM mesh fabric for Semi-Transparent and 80 GSM mesh for Transparent, ensuring superior UVA and UVB ray protection.
No More Suction Cups: Our baby window shades are designed to adhere to car windows effectively, leaving no residue behind after removal thanks to the “Static Cling Technology.” It also gives your car an aesthetically pleasing look!
Hassle-Free Installation: EcoNour’s Car Window Shade can be installed in a few seconds. Roll up and clean the car windows using a damp cloth and stick the rear window shades to the glass.
Fits Most Car Windows: Our Car Shield Sun Protector for side windows fits most cars and SUVs. You can also overlap the sunshades for better coverage. Please note that the shade cannot be used when your windows are rolled down.

Have you ever had the feeling as if you’re inside an oven while your car ride? Is the hot sun making your car ride uncomfortable every day? Are you actively looking out for a permanent solution to avoid the sun rays from attacking you inside your car? Well, we have an ideal solution for all your car interior problems due to the burning sun.

EcoNour Car Window Sun Shade offers you exceptional protection from the hot sun, effectively blocking out all the UV rays and other harmful sun rays, with ease. Made out of durable 80 GSM for Transparent and 120GSM mesh for Semi-Transparent material along with 18S Static Film, EcoNour Car Side, and Rear Window Shade is a great solution to all the problems that occurred in the sun to your car and to your loved ones during the car ride.

NEVER WORRY ABOUT THE SUN’S HEAT!

  • Complete protection from the sun: EcoNour Car Window Shade for Side and Rear Window sun protection helps in blocking the sunlight without any issues, keeping you and your passengers safe from the sun.
  • Convenient to use: You can easily paste the EcoNour Car Window Shade without any hassles and remove the shade without leaving any residue or a mark.
  • Effective Transparency: EcoNour Windshield Sunshade’s transparent layer helps in the viewpoint of the exterior world without compromising on the sunray from entering inside the car.

The 80 GSM mesh allows a smooth transparent view when installed on your car windows without any compromise in sun protection. The 120 GSM Mesh is used in the semi-transparent variants of the sunshades which can darken the effects of sunlight and protects you from the UV Rays. The 18S Static cling can come in handy for increased suction endurance when compared to the conventional 15S cling which is used by others.

  • Dual-Layer Design: Our window shade features an excellent, dual-layer design that gives the best of both material usage, the 18S Film and 80&120 GSM Mesh.
  • Transparent Material: EcoNour’s Window Sunshade comes with two identical transparent shades that offer great deflection from the Sun Rays in an effortless manner.
  • Toughened built materials: Compared with the other window shades, our sunshades can stick long and offers immensely superior durability.
  • Enhanced Elasticity: The increased elasticity on the EcoNour Sunshade can ensure you a stronger contraction and sturdiness with ease.

NO SUCTION CUPS AND NO RESIDUE!

No residue!

EcoNour Side Window Shades stick to your car’s window without adhesive, glues, or suction cups and do not leave any residue on your car window.

No Suction Cups!

Before installing, clean the window with the given cloth and place the Window Sunshade inside your car window. It will stick firmly!

Perfect Protection and Visibility!

Semi-Transparent shade is highly recommended for rear seats for better shading effects. Transparent shades are transparent enough to provide a full range of vision on the road. You can combine both shades to get different results!

Read more

Confused on how to fold? No problem!

BRINGS DOWN THE CAR TEMPERATURE

Using the EcoNour Car Sunshade enhances your car’s fuel efficiency by reducing the vehicle’s load on the AC system during hot summer times.

MADE TO LAST LONG

EcoNour Window Sunshades are incredibly durable along with the 80 & 120GSM mesh which is naturally robust, makes it last longer, and performs well in the long run.

Not just car windows, you can use the EcoNour Window Shades pretty much anywhere in your day-to-day routine. From home windows to reducing the glare while working from home to using them to protect your kids from the sunlight, the possibilities are quite endless!

4

AsterOutdoor shade sail is a stylish and effective shade solution that perfect for most outdoor living space. The shade canopy provides 95% UV block, and can make you comfortable even in the hottest days. Main Features 100% Polyethylene material With 1. 5m hanging PE ropes (3 ropes for Triangle, 4 ropes for Rectangle/Square) Easy to set up with stainless steel D-rings at each corner Ideal for any outdoor event 5-year Lightweight and compact, convenient to carry in most backpacks Specification Size: 16′ x 20′ Color: Sand/Terra/Cream/Graphite Care and Maintenance Exposure to certain chemicals e. g. chlorine can lead to the premature breakdown of the fabric. Shade sails can often be best cleaned by gentle spraying with a garden hose or light scrubbing on stains with a mild strength soapy water. (Please DO NOT machine wash or DRY your sail)
Ideal Use – The outdoor sun shade sail has many uses: over a patio, lawn, garden, backyard, pool, deck, courtyard, park, carport or any other outdoor area to keep you cool in summer. You can conveniently carry it in the original bag or most backpacks since it is lightweight and compact
Durable Construction – The shade sail canopy is a rectangle shape with curved sides, enhancing pull strength and preventing drooping. The sun sail available in several stylish colors and sizes that you can choose from.
High Quality – The patio shade has 100% High Density 185GSM Polyethylene fabric, with strong stitched seams and durable stainless steel D-rings. The fabric is breathable and 95% UV block, allowing air and light to pass through for a more comfortable space. This sail shade also comes along with sturdy polyethylene ropes
Easy to Use – Attach the shade sail D-rings to your structure with the included ropes. Four 5-feet ropes and an instruction sheet come in the package. Measurement is taken from D ring to D ring, Leave an 1.5-2 ft space between the fixing point and the shade sail to fit hardware or rope.
Warranty – Comes with a 5 year warranty when used under normal weather conditions. Easy to Clean with mild detergent and water, fade resistant, will not stain and tear. For the HDPE fabric of shade sail can shrink slightly, it need tolerance for ±6 inch for each side

AsterOutdoor shade sail is a stylish and effective shade solution that perfect for most outdoor living space. The shade canopy provides 95% UV block, and can make you comfortable even in the hottest days.
